text: Sorekara 2-ri wa tabi o tsudzukete, aru machi no jumin no tokoro made kita. Soko no murabito ni shokumotsu o motometaga, kare-ra wa 2-ri o kantai suru koto o kyohi shita. Sonotoki 2-ri wa, masani taoren bakari no kabe o mitsukete, kare wa sore o naoshite yatta. Kare (musa) wa itta. `Moshi nozondanaraba, sorenitaishite kitto hoshu ga toretadeshou
